mapper.insert:
select get_nuevo_id()
insert into rcb_caja_bloq(cabl_id, cabl_nume, cabl_nomb, cabl_vige, ubic_id, audi_fech_crea) values(#{id},#{numero},#{nombre},#{vigente},#{ubicacion.id},localtimestamp)

select get_nuevo_id()
insert into rcb_cand(cand_id, cand_nume, cand_seri, cand_vige, dval_id_uso, pers_id, ubic_id, audi_fech_crea) values(#{id},#{numero},#{serie},#{vigente},#{uso.id},#{persona.id},#{ubicacion.id},localtimestamp)

select get_nuevo_id()
insert into rcb_pers(pers_id, pers_rut, pers_nomb, audi_fech_crea) values(#{id},#{rut,typeHandler=RutTypeHandler},#{nombre},localtimestamp)
mapper.select: select sum( canti ) from ( select count(*) canti from rcb_resp_lcbl a inner join rcb_pers b on (a.pers_id = b.pers_id) where b.pers_rut = #{rut,typeHandler=RutTypeHandler} union all select count(*) canti from rcb_dota_lcbl a inner join rcb_pers b on (a.pers_id = b.pers_id) where b.pers_rut = #{rut,typeHandler=RutTypeHandler} ) as todo
mapper.insert: insert into rcb_trab(pers_id, empr_id, trab_carg, trab_curs_bloq, trab_vige, audi_fech_crea) values(#{id},#{empresa.id},#{cargo},#{tieneCursoBloqueo},#{vigente},localtimestamp)
mapper.select: select count(*) from rcb_trab a inner join rcb_empr b on (a.empr_id = b.empr_id) where b.empr_rut = #{rut,typeHandler=RutTypeHandler}
mapper.insert:
select get_nuevo_id()
insert into rcb_empr(empr_id, empr_rut, empr_nomb, empr_vige, audi_fech_crea) values(#{id},#{rut,typeHandler=RutTypeHandler},#{nombre},#{vigente},localtimestamp)
mapper.select: select count(*) from rcb_tags_eqpo a inner join rcb_eqpo b on (a.eqpo_id = b.eqpo_id) where b.eqpo_id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
select get_nuevo_id()
insert into rcb_eqpo(eqpo_id, eqpo_codi, eqpo_vige, ubic_id, audi_fech_crea) values(#{id},#{codigo},#{vigente},#{ubicacion.id},localtimestamp)

select get_nuevo_id()
insert into rcb_tags_eqpo(taeq_id, taeq_nume, taeq_nomb, taeq_desc, taeq_enrg_cero, taeq_vige, eqpo_id, audi_fech_crea) values(#{id},#{numero},#{nombre},#{descripcion},#{energiaCero},#{vigente},#{equipo.id},localtimestamp)
